findings.title: Honeypot Risk
findings.description: If the transaction tax is increased to more than 49%, the tokens may not be able to be traded.

findings.title: Hidden Mint Functions
findings.description: Hidden mint functions may increase the amount of tokens in circulation and effect the price of the token.

findings.title: Balance Modifier Function
findings.description: If there is a function for this, the contract owner can have the authority to modify the balance of tokens at other addresses.

findings.title: Blacklist Setting function found
findings.description: If there is a blacklist, some addresses may not be able to trade normally. Example: you buy the token and right after your Wallet getting blacklisted. Like so you will be unable to sell. Honeypot Risk.

findings.title: Whitelist Setting function found
findings.description: Contract renounced, function can not be triggered by owner. If there is a function for this Developer can set zero fee or no max wallet size for addresses (for example team wallets can trade without fee. Can cause farming)

findings.title: Honeypot Risk
findings.description: If the transaction tax is increased to more than 49%, the tokens may not be able to be traded.
